title: Détective Surprenant : la fille aux yeux de pierre
overview: Detective Sergeant Surprenant, a veteran of major crimes in Montreal who took refuge in the Islands, investigates with the help of his colleague Geneviève Savoie and inexperienced police officers, even giving up his vacation to solve this sad story. However, he must deal with the arrogant chief inspector Sébastien Gingras, dispatched from Quebec and with whom he has disagreements.
